about_the_game:
Easy VTuber with VRM made with VRoid Studio.
Please use the hashtag #NarikiriVTuber

Click here to learn how to delete watermarks

VRM created with VRoid Studio can be displayed immediately without troublesome conversion.

  • Vroid compatible. VRM compatible
  • Face orientation estimation with webcam
  • Lip sync with voice from microphone
  • The model laughs when laughter comes in from the microphone
  • Eyebrow interlocking
  • Eyebrow transparency
  • Model mouth laughs when the width of the your mouth widens
  • Blue back / green back switching
  • Supports UltraLeap (Please place it facing up on the desktop)
  • Support for textures with transparency <- New
  • VirtualWebCam Transparency support <- Update!
  • NetCollaboration & VoiceChat <- New

ver.1.0.1 released

I made the entire eye area transparent to the hair.
Achieve more animated rendering.
Fixed other visual problems caused by IK.

ver.1.5.0 released

Virtual WebCam Transparency support+Support for textures with transparency

name: NarikiriVTuber

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Memory: 500 MB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Memory: 500 MB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

short_description: Easy to be VTuber. Vroid&VRM compatible. Face orientation estimation with webcam Supports Virtual WebCam and Leap Motion. etc.
supported_languages: English, Japanese, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Arabic, Indonesian, Ukrainian, Dutch, Greek, Swedish, Spanish - Latin America, Thai, Czech, Danish, Turkish, Norwegian, Hungarian, Finnish, Bulgarian, Vietnamese, Portuguese - Brazil, Portuguese - Portugal, Polish, Romanian, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Korean
